
Mr x has made a jumping robot and want to test it.Each time robot travels m meter with full charge.
After m meter mr.x recharges the robot.
Calculate the number of times mr.x has to recharge the robot in order to traverse the path.


Input:
First line contains number of test cases T. Next T lines contains three integers A, B and M separated by single space. A denoted the starting point, B the finishing point - and M-meters - the distance covered.


Output:
For each test case print the number of times the robot had to recharge in the range [A, B] inclusive.


Constraints:
1<=T<=100000


Sample Input
3
1 4 3
0 20 1
3 9 3



Sample Output
0
20
2
